title: The Research director
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Morten Parker and Ronald Weyman
brief_description: A description of the work of a research director of a United Steel Workers Union in Canada. The painstaking research and analyses of economic information, and the arrangement of arguments that lie beneath the negotiations of labour unions for better wages and working conditions are shown.
